title: Play Zone - Nikushoku Kareshi to Kaikan Tenshi
original_name: プレイゾーン~肉食彼氏と快感天使~
sinopse: Music genius and a real looker, the ''special one'' Sato, who'd have thought he'd be replaced by shy newcomer Milli with blue eyes that reveal under light, a fan of Sato's since he was 16 years old. Milli could only dream about becoming a DJ, and maybe he achieved something more ''special'' than he could ever dream of...
